CustomField.description: List and summarize the remediation costs. Attach a statement of the costs to be incurred. Paid invoices must be from a Qualified Person as defined in Ontario Regulation 153/04 of the Environmental Protection Act or an entity that is satisfactory to the City. The costs claimed may be subject to an independent audit at the City's request, to be conducted at the sole expense of the property owner.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Estimated cost of remediation $ that Include a statement of costs to be incurred in connection with the remediation. The statement must summarize all remediation costs
CustomField.label: Estimated cost of remediation $
